OOC: Sorry, I meant to post this here in this story line. I apologize: 

Actually we are all standing just outside or near to the base doors. As
soon as Hydras exits the base he would be in the middle of stuff.

BIC:

As Hydras flew up out of the base Myrmidon continued to float in
midair, boosters flaring from his back, his birdlike wings
ourstretched. He turned to look at Hydras expressionlessly for a moment
and then turned back to look at Malice.

"This is the supreme commander of the Predacon forces at this base."
Myrmidon's voice boomed in the direction of Malice, introducing the
ermerging Hydras, "Face him if you dare!"

Myrmidon falls silent, his face revealing none of his internal
misgivings of this whole matter.

Preston
(Myrmidon)
